statements: SELECT * FROM CourseMaterials WHERE course_id = 1;
SELECT lecture_title, resource_link FROM CourseMaterials WHERE assignment_name IS NULL;
SELECT * FROM CourseMaterials WHERE course_id IN (2, 3, 4);
SELECT assignment_name, lecture_title, resource_link FROM CourseMaterials WHERE course_id = 2;
SELECT lecture_title, assignment_name FROM CourseMaterials WHERE course_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM CourseMaterials WHERE course_id = 1;
SELECT lecture_title, resource_link FROM CourseMaterials WHERE assignment_name IS NOT NULL;
SELECT course_id, lecture_title FROM CourseMaterials ORDER BY course_id DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT assignment_name FROM CourseMaterials;
SELECT * FROM CourseMaterials WHERE lecture_title LIKE '%Introduction%';
SELECT * FROM lectures;
SELECT lecture_name, lecturer_name FROM lectures WHERE lecture_date = '2022-10-20';
SELECT lecture_name, lecture_date, lecturer_name FROM lectures ORDER BY lecture_date DESC;
SELECT lecture_name, lecturer_name FROM lectures WHERE lecture_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT lecture_name, lecturer_name, lecture_date FROM lectures WHERE lecturer_name = 'John Doe';
SELECT lecture_name, lecture_date, lecturer_name FROM lectures WHERE lecture_id = 'b7387a41-3eeb-4939-89a3-306c17181286';
SELECT * FROM assignments WHERE deadline > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY assignment_name DESC;
SELECT COUNT(lecture_id) AS total_lectures, lecture_date FROM lectures GROUP BY lecture_date HAVING total_lectures > 1 ORDER BY lecture_date ASC;
SELECT lecture_name, lecturer_name, assignment_name FROM lectures LEFT JOIN assignments ON lectures.lecture_id = assignments.course_id WHERE assignments.assignment_id IS NOT NULL;
SELECT lecture_name, DATE_PART('year', lecture_date) AS year FROM lectures WHERE lecture_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' ORDER BY year DESC;
SELECT lecture_name, lecturer_name FROM lectures;
SELECT lecture_name, lecture_date FROM lectures ORDER BY lecture_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM assignments WHERE deadline > '2022-01-01';
SELECT lecture_name, lecturer_name FROM lectures WHERE lecture_date = '2022-08-15';
SELECT lecture_name, lecturer_name FROM lectures WHERE lecturer_name LIKE '%Smith%';
SELECT lecture_name, lecturer_name, lecture_date FROM lectures WHERE lecture_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY lecture_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM assignments WHERE deadline < '2022-12-31' AND max_score > 50;
SELECT lecture_name, lecturer_name, lecture_date FROM lectures WHERE lecturer_name = 'John Doe' ORDER BY lecture_date ASC;
SELECT lecture_name, lecturer_name, lecture_date FROM lectures WHERE lecture_name LIKE 'Intro%' OR lecturer_name LIKE '%Smith%';
SELECT assignment_name, deadline, max_score FROM assignments ORDER BY deadline ASC LIMIT 3;
SELECT * FROM Lectures;
SELECT lecture_id, lecture_name FROM Lectures WHERE lecture_date = '2022-01-15';
SELECT assignment_name, deadline FROM Assignments WHERE deadline > '2022-06-30';
SELECT resource_name, resource_link FROM Resources WHERE resource_id BETWEEN 100 AND 200;
SELECT material_id, material_name, material_type FROM CourseMaterials ORDER BY material_id DESC;
SELECT lecture_name, lecture_date FROM Lectures WHERE lecture_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT assignment_name FROM Assignments WHERE deadline < '2022-12-31';
SELECT resource_name, resource_link FROM Resources WHERE resource_id BETWEEN 100 AND 200;
SELECT * FROM CourseMaterials WHERE material_type = 'Video' ORDER BY material_name DESC;
SELECT lecture_name, lecture_date FROM Lectures WHERE lecture_name LIKE '%SQL%' ORDER BY lecture_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM lectures;
SELECT lecture_title, lecture_date FROM lectures WHERE course_id = 101;
SELECT user_name FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT course_name, course_description FROM courses WHERE course_id = 201;
SELECT resource_name, resource_type FROM resources WHERE course_id = 301;
SELECT * FROM lectures WHERE lecture_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY lecture_id DESC;
SELECT lecture_title, course_id FROM lectures INNER JOIN courses ON lectures.course_id = courses.course_id WHERE course_name LIKE '%Database%' LIMIT 5;
SELECT assignments.assignment_title, assignments.max_score, courses.course_name FROM assignments INNER JOIN courses ON assignments.course_id = courses.course_id ORDER BY max_score ASC;
SELECT user_name, user_email FROM users WHERE user_email IS NOT NULL;
SELECT lecture_date, course_name, speaker_id FROM lectures INNER JOIN courses ON lectures.course_id = courses.course_id ORDER BY lecture_date ASC, course_name DESC;
